body.name: Kitsure Dish Drying Rack- Space-Saving, for Kitchen Counter, Durable Stainless Steel Rack with a Cutlery Holder, for Dishes, Knives, Spoons, and Forks
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 49 mins
features: SMALL VOLUME: Kitsure dish rack is suitable for kitchens with limited space. It measures only 15.6"*12.0"*4.9", while it's capable of holding 6 plates and other bowls and glasses. With a Kitsure dish rack, you can perfectly save your countertop space.

PREMIUM DURABLE MATERIAL: Kitsure Kitchen dish drying rack has a durable plastic drainboard and premium stainless steel which can effectively prevent rust and deformation. And you can clean the rack easily by rinsing it under a running tap.

ROTATABLE WATER OUTLET: This kitchen dish drying rack is equipped with a rotatable water outlet which can be turned in three directions, so the water from the dishes can be led to the sink. There won't be any water left on the counter!

CONVENIENT TO USE: Kitsure drying rack for kitchen consists of a cutlery holder, a dish rack, and a drainboard set. With such a simple structure, it is easy to install as no tool is needed in the process. And with four silicone leg covers to avoid slipping, the dish rack stays firmly where it is.

DETACHABLE CUTLERY HOLDER: The cutlery holder of this dish drying rack is divided into two spaces for cutlery and other small items. With this dish rack, you can always find the right place for various tableware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kitsure Dish Drying Rack- Space-Saving, for Kitchen Counter, Durable Stainless Steel Rack
reviews.reviewText: Kitsure Dish Drying Rack- Space-Saving, for Kitchen Counter, Durable Stainless Steel RackThis dish Drying Rack is great for what I needed.The pan on the bottom is made of sturdy black plastic and has a spout in the middle of the bottom of the tray that can be moved from the front to the side.This is about medium sized, it will take a few dish plates, bowls, some cups and silver ware.Absolutely fabulous for drying your dishes after you wash them. Put them in the rack and forget them. They will be dry when you come back to put them away.Lets talk about the Drain Spout..............The Drain Spout is designed to be on the side or front of the tray, and be directing water into the sink basin.It does this very well, no leaks.BUT lets talk about the sink.If you have a sink that is mounted under the counter top this will work perfectly.If you have a sink that has that ridge around the sink that is about 1/8" high, the spout will go over it with no problems.BUT........... yes there are buts in this description.MY SINK has a lip on top of the counter top that is roughly 3/8" high and the spout cannot fit over that lip.The SOLUTION is to raise the drain tray 1/2" and the drain spout will fit over the sink lip perfectly.The cheap easy solution to raise the tray would be to get a card board tube that your paper towels come in, and cut it 1/2 longer than the legs on the tray. make 4 of them, then put them over the legs and tape them to the tray.as long as the new legs do not get wet, they will handle the weight. when they do get wet, just make new ones.for more permanent footings, find something that is not made of card board.Now this is what I had to do because my sink has an unusually high sink lip on the counter. But it works great with the slight lift added.Don't think that this drain tray is the problem, it is not. There are other sinks that will not work because of the sink lip height. Most should not have any problem at all.I recommend this Dish Drying Rack absolutely. It does everything I needed it to do.I do not know the seller, nor did I get any product or money for my random review.230915 0207

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Great dish drainer. Perfect size for my small apartment. Pretty sturdy stand though I wish the utensil holder part wasn’t so awkward. Does its job as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very durable and sturdy drainer!
reviews.reviewText: I have always hated the flimsy and non-durable plastic drainer you get in the stores! I also have very little counter space so when I saw this double tier option for a metal dish drainer, I just knew I had to grab it! It takes up very little counter space while still allowing to place a lot of my dishes that I wait to the last minute to wash! I am very much satisfied with this item, and assembly was so easy and quick! Definitely recommended for anyone who tends to have a lot of dishes and a small kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect counter fit, clean look and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This rack is sturdy and a perfect fit for my counter. I just wish I had the option to hang the utensil holder on the outside of the rack to maximize rack space. The holes won’t let water drip due to the angle it leans when it is hanging on the outside. I love everything else about it so definitely not a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this small dish rack
reviews.reviewText: It is slightly smaller than our old dish rack but takes up a lot less space and still holds all our dishes. It has a rail on all sides which helps to hold more dishes. Also it drains well right into the sink. It looks nice too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great dish rack
reviews.reviewText: I really like this dish rack. It is sturdy and has lots of room for my dishes, etc. The "spout" under the rack is truly wonderful. It drains the water out into the sink so well. Glad I got this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars definitely only for small spaces and lightweight items
reviews.reviewText: This drying rack is attractive and compact. However, it is only for very small quantities of lightweight items, perhaps a few glasses and dishes -- and I mean lightweight dishes, not heavy stoneware-type plates. The utensil tray is **extremely** shallow. I put steak knives in with the sharp points at the bottom of the utensil holder, and it is not even deep enough to conceal the entire sharp edge of the blade. Also the utensil holder is far too small to hold more than a few items. Unless you are using plastic utensils or tiny dessert-sized forks, etc. they will be falling out of the holder because it is not deep enough to hold any weight.Okay for the price, but I use it as an additional drying rack for a few glasses etc. I would not trust its stability for anything more than that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually dislike having a drying rack in my kitchen but this one is sleek, modern and functional. Stores many plates/cups/pans and to my surprise, has a drain/spout that eliminates excess water! That’s my favorite part, don’t have to worry about mold/bacteria build up. 100% recommend.
Cumplió mis expectativas, llegó a tiempo, de buenos materiales y buen tamaño.

Die Geschirrablage ist sehr robust und macht einen stabilen Eindruck.Dank der Silikonfüße steht Sie sehr sicher und verrutscht nicht. Durch den beweglichen Wasserablauf kann das Wasser direkt ins Spülbecken abfließen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am really impressed by this dish drainer. I have a small kitchen and this drainer fits my sink exactly. It has a drain attached underneath which drains into the sink. It looks good and is ideal for my needs. This size is good if you don’t have a lot of dishes to wash. Don’t think this size would be good for a large family. The construction is strong and it is easy to keep clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llego a tiempo y corresponde al producto ofrecido. Bueno para cocina pequeña
